tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE energy_consumption_data (
  id INT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  house_id INT,
  energy_consumed DECIMAL,
  PRIMARY KEY (id)
);

CREATE TABLE resource_allocation (
  id INT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  zone_id INT,
  resource_allocated DECIMAL,
  PRIMARY KEY (id)
);

CREATE TABLE EnergyConsumptionData (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMPTZ,
    energy_consumption DOUBLE PRECISION,
    location TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Users (
    user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    username TEXT,
    email TEXT,
    address TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE MeterReading (
    reading_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    meter_id UUID,
    timestamp TIMESTAMPTZ,
    reading_value DOUBLE PRECISION
)

CREATE TABLE ResourceAllocation (
    allocation_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMPTZ,
    resource_type TEXT,
    allocated_amount DOUBLE PRECISION
)
